sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; // MUI Imports import Typography from "@mui/material/Typography"; import Box from "@mui/material/Box"; import Chip from "@mui/material/Chip"; import Stack from "@mui/material/Stack"; import Table from "@mui/material/Table"; import TableBody from "@mui/material/TableBody"; import TableCell from "@mui/material/TableCell"; import TableHead from "@mui/material/TableHead"; import TableRow from "@mui/material/TableRow"; const PlayerStatsGoalie = (props) => { // Destructure props const { stats } = props; return ( All Situations Stat Total Wins {stats.wins} Losses {stats.losses} Saves {stats.saves} Goals Against {stats.goalsAgainst} Save Percentage {stats.savePercentage.toFixed(4) * 100}% Goals Against Average {stats.goalAgainstAverage.toFixed(2)} Shutouts {stats.shutouts}
Even Strength Stat Total Shots {stats.evenShots} Saves {stats.evenSaves} Save Percentage {stats.evenStrengthSavePercentage.toFixed(2)}%
Power Play Stat Total Time on Ice {stats.powerPlayTimeOnIce}
Short Handed Stat Total Time on Ice {stats.shortHandedTimeOnIce}
); }; export default PlayerStatsGoalie;
